Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Target Dimension or Hierarchy (as dim:hier), accepts wildcards (if = *, then all the dimensions)

Parameters.Name: pEle
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Element(s), accepts wildcards ( * will include ALL)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter character if list used for pDim, pHier or pEle

Parameters.Name: pTgtDir
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Directory Path (defaults to Error File Directory if blank)

Parameters.Name: pTgtFile
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Root file name without file extension. If blank "bedrock_dimension_script" will be used

Parameters.Name: pTitleRecord
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Boolean 1 = Yes - Include header row

Parameters.Name: pDimInfo
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Include dimension info section (SortOrder, HierarchyProperties, etc.)

Parameters.Name: pAttrVal
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Include attribute values (for selected elements in pEle)

Parameters.Name: pCharacterSet
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: The output character set (defaults to TM1CS_UTF8 if blank)
